SummaryEnglish: In the world, a 100 years in the future, no one drives cars - instead, computer-controlled, electrically powered "AI cars" automatically take you where you want to go. However, when the AI cars mysteriously start to run amok, an organization called eX-Driver is established to figure out why.

3.SummaryEnglish: a special video showing the real cars used in the anime

4.SummaryEnglish: the behind the scenes of the soul that is how it was realized.

2.SummaryEnglish: We see the rivalry between Lisa and Souichi develop as well as get to know Lorna, Lisa and Souichi better.

5.SummaryEnglish: There haven't been any run away cars for a long time so the eX-Driver's have some down time. Souichi is overhauling the Seven's engine while Lorna and Lisa decide to head for the beach.

6.SummaryEnglish: This episode starts at the eX-Driver command center, where Mr. Munakata, Nina and the other guy are tracking the runaway gasoline cars on their computers, hoping that when they run out of gas they'll have to leave the city and things can get back to normal.
